name: Hutt River Te Awa Kairangi Whitewater Festival, 5th Annual
description:
BIGGER AND BETTER THIS YEAR!!!!!  All of the usual shenanigans but this year we will have a band under the marquee on Saturday night.  There will also be prizes for the race winners and spot prizes for racers and volunteers.  

Whitewater, music, bbq, camping and all around good times.  Come join us for any and all of the Hutt River Festival events.  There are events for kayaks and packrafts. 

Get you team of 3 together for the long running Hutt Gorge Race.  There are also individual grade 3 and grade 2 races along with social paddles as well.  

SCHEDULE

3:00 KAITOKE GORGE PADDLE
Dial in your race lines.

CAMPING at Kaitoke Regional Park, Area 5, Gates close at 9:00pm

SATURDAY

Packrafts-Skills activitites, 
Hosted by Tararua Packrafters
https://fb.me/e/6DQPu49LN

9:00am- Registration opens for Grade 2 and Team Gorge Race

10:00am-GRADE 2 INDIVIDUAL $15 entry fee
Hosted by the Victoria University Canoe Club.  Race will be from parking area below the weir to the steps before the flume bridge.  Registration starts at 8:00. 
https://www.facebook.com/events/1420413272694280

12:00pm-KAITOKE GORGE TEAM RACE 
Hosted by Hutt Valley Canoe Club
$15/person entry fee
This is the main event hosted by Hutt Valley Canoe Club, the prestigious and long running (54 years) team races. Registration starts at 9:00AM
https://huttvalleycanoeclub.org.nz/hutt-gorge-race/  
Registration and Race Rules & Details

12:30pm-COMMUNITY KAITOKE GORGE RUN
Anyone not racing that feels up to a Grade 3 paddle down the Kaitoke Gorge. 
https://www.facebook.com/events/865490752305609

5:00ish-BBQ.  Free to all race participants and volunteers. 
Kaitoke Regional Park Campsite #5

7:30 Live Band and Party with music by Powercut.
 https://open.spotify.com/artist/5KNysnuBegEml07cxwCJYL

Bring your camping gear, beverages, firewood, and $8 for camping fees.

SUNDAY

9:30am-INDIVIDUAL KAYAK RACE, $5 entry fee.
https://www.facebook.com/events/810493760894343

9:30-COMMUNITY KAITOKE GORGE RUN
Anyone not racing that feels up to a Grade 3 paddle down the Kaitoke Gorge.  
https://www.facebook.com/events/865490752305609

12:00 Prize giving for individual races. 

River info here. https://www.riverguide.co.nz/.../5d16ba7b7b83b60017c668bc 

Schedule could change.  More information coming soon.  

Brought to you by the Hutt River Canoe Club, Victoria University Canoe Club, Tararua Packrafters, and Wellington Rafting Company.
formattedDate: Oct 11 at 3:00 PM – Oct 13 at 12:00 PM NZDT
